## InternalRelationalField type

Internal representation of Model Field that exposes the `data` property. Used at buildtime.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type InternalRelationalField = ModelRelationalField<ModelRelationalFieldParamShape, string, never> & {
    data: ModelRelationalFieldData;
};
```
